title: A treatise of contentment leading a Christian with much patience through all afflicted conditions by sundry rules of heavenly wisedome : whereunto is annexed first, A treatise of the improvement of time, secondly, The holy warre, in a visitation sermon / by T.T.
author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.
publisher: Printed by R.H. for Iohn Bartlet,
notes: "A treatise of the improvement of time": p. 155-189.
